## hpr3980 :: Huntsville to Vicksburg

 We survive the freezing weather in Huntsville, and then move on to
our next major stop in Vicksburg, Mississippi. But we have a problem of
a refrigerator that stops working and needs to be replaced.
Links:

https://flic.kr/s/aHBqjAvdPH
https://flic.kr/s/aHBqjAvfVo
https://www.palain.com/travel/rv-trip-2022-2023-southeast-us/huntsville-to-vic
